attributes.action: Provide more support for additional needs in children.
attributes.additional_details: Children are being failed through the system and struggles will worsen. They should not have to wait to be assessed from a specific age, and they should not have to wait years on end. Parents are not being listened to regarding concerns, resulting in delays of support for their child/children. With additional support within schools, local authorities and relevant healthcare professionals, children can go on to have a successful education and everyday living.
attributes.background: Provide more funding and not having a required age to be assessed from a specific age, as this will impact education and everyday life without the correct support in place.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign other open petitions with similar themes:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634116
Increase funding for special educational needs and disabilities (SEND) education

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637624
Fund increased support for SEN children in mainstream schools

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636123
Increase funding for SEND support in early years and school

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632517
Review how local authorities support children with special educational needs

You can make a complaint about the support your child's school provides for special educational needs at the following link: https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-school/sen-complaints
